definition: to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Should the disinfected needle dry out before re-using it?
sentences.chinese: 是否應該在針具消毒晾乾後再重複使用？

sentences.english: Japonica rice cooked Shanglong Zheng Wash , dry stand -by .
sentences.chinese: 粳米洗淨上籠蒸熟，晾乾待用。

sentences.english: Airing is under ventilated place, drying machine is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 放在通風處晾乾，不可放入乾燥機中。

sentences.english: Leave the dishes to dry ( off ).
Let the washing spin before you put it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 先讓衣服在脫水機裏轉一轉，再拿出去晾乾。

sentences.english: You need to let it hang dry till it becomes a bit tougher to the touch.
sentences.chinese: 你需要把他掛起來自然晾乾，直到它摸上去有點僵硬。

sentences.english: Leave the trousers on the washing-line to air.
sentences.chinese: 把褲子掛到晾衣繩上去晾乾。

sentences.english: A thick coating stain sealer, and make it dry overnight.
sentences.chinese: 塗裝一層厚的污漬封閉底漆，並使它隔夜晾乾。

sentences.english: Then he said that they should be hung up to dry.
sentences.chinese: 然後再把那些穀穗掛起來晾乾。

sentences.english: He didn't hang himself, I hung him up to dry.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有自殺，是我把他吊起來好讓他晾乾。

sentences.english: Press together and allow to dry.
sentences.chinese: 把兩層帶子壓在一起，等晾乾。

sentences.english: Wash as you use things. Let them dry.
sentences.chinese: 邊用邊洗那些工具，然後把它們晾乾。

sentences.english: The cages of a flame disperser are a perfect place for drying a uniform.
sentences.chinese: 熱量分散器是晾乾衣服的理想之地。

sentences.english: Hand the washing out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 把洗好的衣服掛出去晾乾。

sentences.english: Remove from ice bath and dry; peach skin should peel off very easily.
sentences.chinese: 晾乾後，桃子皮就可以很容易地被去掉啦。

sentences.english: Pump into hands, lather vigorously, rinse and dry.
sentences.chinese: 壓出泡沫得到中，揉搓泡沫，沖洗晾乾。

definition: to dry in the air/(fig.) to cold-shoulder
